content: sl1pwyif k to the last st work lace bind off on ws row sl1pwyif p to the last st see below for a description of this technique k in stockinette for 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 10 75 11 12 lace bind off 13 or 21 5 23 24 26 5 29 32 34 5 37 39 5 cm *knit 2 together through the back loop put stitch back ending after a ws row onto the left needle repeat from * around put all sts on hold onto scrap yarn or spare needle sleeves break yarn repeat for both sleeves beg along corner of co edge with rs facing pick up and round 1 with rs facing begin at front underarm pick up k 27 30 33 36 39 41 44 47 50 sts and k 85 90 95 105 115 125 135 145 155 sts cable co 46 50 54 58 62 68 72 76 80 sts around pm and join in the round pick up and k rem 27 30 33 36 39 41 44 47 50 sts k in stockinette for 2 2 5 2 5 3 3 3 5 3 5 4 4 or 5 along co edge ending at the opposite corner 6 5 6 5 7 5 7 5 9 9 10 10 cm do not join to work in the round you will be working flat set-up round k increase 5 0 5 5 5 5 5 5 5 sts evenly until indicated around on rs row - sl1pwyif k to the last st total sts 90 90 100 110 120 130 140 150 160 on ws row sl1pwyif p to the last st work lace chart once over all sts for k in stockinette for 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 10 75 11 12 9 9 10 11 12 13 14 15 16 reps for a total of 10 13 or 21 5 23 24 26 5 29 32 34 5 37 39 5 cm rnds ending with a ws row pm between reps if desired written instructions on page 2 joining in the round row sl1pwyif k to last st k across sts on hold with rs facing pm work lace bind off next round join to work in the round k to eor see the box below left for a description of this technique total sts 200 220 240 260 280 300 320 340 360 finishing weave in all loose ends and gently block body enjoy continue working in stockinette until piece measures 6 15cm from underarm or knit to the desired length keeping in mind to reserve approx 3 for lace hem © copyright dear ingénue | all rights reserved | 2021 v 1 2 5 written instructions for chart round 1 *k4 k2tog k yo k3 repeat from * to eor round 2 *k3 k2tog k2 yo k3 repeat from * to eor i d love to see your tee round 3
